Serialized Form

  • Package ui

    • Class ui.GamePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • fallPerFrame

          int fallPerFrame
          Number of pixels each icon falls per frame when animating.

        • fallingSpeed

          int fallingSpeed
          Interval between frames when animating falling icons, in milliseconds.

        • numberOfFlashes

          int numberOfFlashes
          Number of times to flash when a pair is selected.

        • flashingSpeed

          int flashingSpeed
          Interval between flashes, in milliseconds.

        • scorePanel

          ScorePanel scorePanel
          Score panel associated with the game.

        • timer

          javax.swing.Timer timer
          The javax.swing.Timer instance used to animate the UI.

        • game

          DotsGame game
          The IGame instance for which this is the UI.

        • flashingState

          int flashingState
          State variable counts down to zero while flashing the cells to be collapsed.

        • cellsToCollapse

          java.util.ArrayList<E> cellsToCollapse
          Cells about to be collapsed are flashed briefly before moving.

        • collapsing

          boolean collapsing
          Flag indicates whether we are currently moving cells down.

        • movingCells

          java.util.ArrayList<E> movingCells
          Cells currently being moved down during a collapse.

        • filling

          boolean filling
          Flag indicates whether we are currently filling new cells.

        • fillingCells

          java.util.ArrayList<E> fillingCells
          New cells filled from top.

        • mouseX

          int mouseX
          Mouse x coordinate saved for use in paintComponent.

        • mouseY

          int mouseY
          Mouse y coordinate saved for use in paintComponent.

    • Class ui.ScorePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • score

          int score
          Score to be displayed.
